algorithm_technique: Using a set to track occupied positions and performing removals/additions.
problem_summary_simple: Move marbles between positions and return the final occupied positions.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate marble movements by updating a set of occupied positions, then sort the final set.
key_insights: A set is ideal for tracking unique occupied positions due to efficient add/remove operations.
The problem guarantees that a marble exists at moveFrom[i], simplifying logic.
Sorting the final set is required for the output format.
